background_description: The background consists of dark, murky green-blue water with visible ripples, reflections, and some small floating plant debris on the surface. The water appears to be still in some areas and gently disturbed around the animal.
explanation: The image clearly shows an otter with its head out of the water. Its light greyish-brown fur and distinct facial features stand out sharply against the darker water, indicating no attempt at camouflage.
